row.entry: Single pile, top-left. The rest of the deck is placed here after dealing on to the Tableau. Cards are turned over one at a time to Waste.
Single pile to the right of the Stock. To be taken from Stock. Top card available for play.
Four piles, top-right, built up in suit from Ace to King.

Seven piles. Four cards are dealt to each pile when the game starts. Build down in suit. Empty spaces can be filled with a King. Any number of cards may be moved at once so long as the bottom card is the same suit and one less in value than the top of the target pile.

sect2.title: Goal
sect2.para: Move all cards to the Foundation piles.

sect2.title: Rules
sect2.para: Cards in the Tableau are built down by suit. Any number of cards may be moved at once so long as the bottom card is the same suit and one less in value than the top of the target pile. This means you may move a pile of cards that do not build down in suit, so long as the two contacting cards do.
Empty spaces can be filled with a King.

Foundations are built up in suit from Ace to King. Cards in the Foundations are no longer in play. Double clicking on a card will move it to the appropriate Foundation pile if such a move is possible.

sect2.title: Scoring
sect2.para: Each card in the Foundation piles scores one point.
